participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a passion for literature and the arts.
participant_1.background: I m a vegetarian. When i have nothing else to do , i read books. I like to write poetry. I work as a bartender. I used to be in the marines.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and charismatic, enjoys sharing experiences and has a flair for the dramatic.
participant_2.background: My mother is a well known celebrity. I have been on the tv news six times. I have traveled overseas many times. I am a civil war reenactment participant.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to travel, and I've been on the TV news six times.
Wow, that's really cool! Do you have any favorite travel destinations?
I love going to Europe, especially Italy.
I've been to Italy once, and I loved it!
What did you like most about it?
I loved the food, the history, and the culture.
Me too! I'm really hoping to go back someday.
What do you do for work?
I'm a civil war reenactment participant.
That's really interesting! Have you ever been in a reenactment battle?
Yes, I have! It was really fun.
I bet it was! What kind of role do you play in the reenactments?
I usually play a soldier.
That's cool! Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to write poetry.
I love poetry! I used to write a lot of it when I was younger.
That's cool! Do you still write poetry?
I don't as much as I used to, but I still enjoy it.
I'm glad you still enjoy it!
